articles.title: The Callisto Protocol Has an Achievement for Seeing Every Single Possible Death - IGN
articles.description: The Callisto Protocol's developers won't tell us how man different death animations there are in the game - but they've revealed you'll get an achievement for seeing every single gruesome outcome.
articles.content:
The Callisto Protocol features a lot of different ways to die - and will reward you for being punished with every single one.
